name: Revolution (itch) (Wael Alayan)
description:
PLEASE READ IMPORTANT NOTES AT THE BOTTOM!!

An exciting action, thriller, short story! Told in a 2D platformer game. The gameplay is quite simplistic because the point of this project was to focus on telling a story. The game contains 4 levels with multiple cutscenes.

Please give it a shot and tell me what you think about the story!

READ THIS PART BELOW PLEASE:

(The web version has some bugs, however the downloadable EXE version does not have these issues.)

(I STRONGLY RECOMMEND downloading the EXE version to try out the game with no bugs.)

Below are the free assets which I have used with permission:

Assets:

 https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-war-pixel-art-game-backgrounds

 https://assetbakery.itch.io/2d-fighter-3

 https://www.deviantart.com/theen4cer/art/Sprite-Wars-Trooper-Template-79945992

https://opengameart.org/content/camp-fire-animation-for-rpgs-finished

https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment

https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city

Music is by TeknoAxe - http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

Sound Effects are by David Fesliyan -  www.fesliyanstudios.com
